title: League Of Legends: Would you rather...?

replies.body:
1 B
2 A Ahri ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )
3 B
4 B
5 B
6 A
7 B
8 A
/ 2. If only you could chose both A and B so you would always get first blood ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )

1. B, At least Azir is semi-viable in the right hands. Kalista is objectively useless.

2. A, I'd love to be with Sona for a day.

3. A, Some Yasuo players, as cancerously toxic as they may be, are pretty effing good. Feeding bot lane = automatic GG...

4. A, Easy choice for me. Diamond 1 Mastery 7 is automatically going to play better than a Challenger first-timer. Plus, Sivir is really underrated on her carry potential.

5. B, A perfect team comp doesn't necessarily mean everyone knows HOW to play the composition. I'd rather just remove a dumb champ. {{champion:64}}

6. C, Evelynn is revealed if you get near her, so you at least have a chance of winning. (Though your definition of "winning" will massively vary depending on how hard she rides you...Best case scenario: You aren't walking for a couple days. Worst case scenario: You probably die before you "peak". ._.)

7. A, Since Demacia is a draconic shithole. (Also, I'm pretty sure Sona is allied with Ionia, not Demacia)

8. A, As much as I hate getting flamed at, I have thick enough skin to tolerate it. Plus, any opportunity to give Ghostcrawler the boot on how a champion should turn out is an opportunity worth taking.

Fun post. Here's an upvote.

Sona was born in Ionia and adopted into House Buvelle; famed Demacian musician 
( according to wiki, I didn't know either )
HOnestly I was thinking Sona also! (or Ryze actually)

1. A, I love the challenge of finding ways for terribad champions to work effectively.
2. A, Gotta figure out which one can give me unlimited power in a single day.
3. A, every yasuo player is toxic. may as well get this one over with, and get some mileage out of my mute.
4. A, between the two I believe the sivir would do better. because lets face it, if at challenger they have never played jinx, then they probably also don't play botlane.
5. A, I hate way too many champions.
6. A, Pretty sure that would be fun, and a great story. Also unrelated note I am not opposed to the idea of killing several random civvies.
7. B, I would love to settle down into a small demacian protectorate like jandelle or something where the cragbeasts don't oft roam and where I could live lazily and not worry about poison gas, gray murderers and psycho bitches.
8. A, I have about fifty completed champion concepts on my hard drive. (most of them are pretty much carbon copies of later released champions kit-wise) I would love to actually have a stamp on the game to prove it as well.

1: Would you rather: 
> A: Have a Kalista on your team 
>B: Have a Azir on your team 
**Both. Give me a Kalista who's Bound her Support Azir**

2: Would you rather: 
> A: Spent a day with a champion you like  ( and what champion would that be? )
> B: Always make first blood 
**A, Illaoi**

3: Would you rather: 
> A: Have a toxic Yasuo player on your team 
>B: Have a feeding bot lane 
**Do I have to choose? Both are pretty bad and both are fairly common**


4: Would you rather: 
> A: Support a Diamond 1 Mastery 7 Sivir 
>B: Support a Challenger first time Jinx 
**B**

5: Would you rather:
> A: Always have a perfect team comp 
>B: Never have to face a champion you hate ( You don't have to ban him / her, the champion does just not get picked in your game ) 
**B, Annie**


6: Would you rather: 
> A: Go shopping with Sion 
>B: Go to the cinema with Amumu 
>C: Play hide and seek with Evelynn 
**A, I bet Sion knows all the latest Noxian Fashions**


7: Would you rather
> A: Live in Piltover
>B: Live in DEMACIAAAA            
*Piltover*

Last of all

8: Would you rather:
> A: Get to create the next champion 
>B: Never will be flamed at again ( We have all been there, don't lie. ) {{summoner:14}} 
*Can I just Fire CertainlyT?*

1: A: Have a Kalista on your team. 
2:A: Spend a day with a champion you like ( {{champion:136}} )
3:A: Have a toxic Yasuo player on your team 
4:A: Support a Diamond 1 Mastery 7 Sivir 
5:A: Always have a perfect team comp 
6:B: Go to the cinema with Amumu 
7:B: Live in DEMACIAAAA 
8:B: Never will be flamed at again

1. Azir, because he can still potentially be useful.
2. A day with Bard; he can travel through dimensions to visit me with cocoa. (Or Heimerdinger. He would probably just leave some technical marvel with me accidentally, and I could make a fortune reverse engineering it).
3. Yasuo, I can just mute the asshat.
4. Sivir. I can deal with an ADC who knows what they can do.
5. Teamcomp, because I can just watch my hated champ have a hard time against a shit matchup.
6. Shopping with Sion. "Paper or Plastic? **THE SKIN FRESHLY TORN FROM THE HEADS OF MY ENEMIES**".
7. SCIENCE
8. Create champion, of course. LET THE MEMES FLOW.
I'm making a champion that is like Kassadin and Poppy combined. He/she/it gets power from enemy mobility abilities and has built in mechanics to shut their abilities down. Meta = Rekt.

A day with a champion I like, no arguments! 
*cough* if I sell Sona's music, I can probably become rich. But if I can get Talon in here, I can probably get someone I hate killed.... Ooh, but Nasus could teach me everything.....
Hmmmm.

1 Azir cuz I don't have to lane with him

2 The kill ~~steal~~ secure, tho

3 I'm screwed either way. Yasuo.

4 GOTTA GO FAST (A)

5: B DEFINITELY

6: Shopping with Sion.

7 Piltover, depending on the event that's probably coming up.

8: hm... if reworks count as a new champ, then that one. otherwise no flaming.

1 B    Azir has a better teamfight and gives map control. They're both crappy right now, but he provide a little more imo
2 A    Can't decide{{champion:254}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:114}} pls halp me
3 B    We can still win and have fun with a feeding bot (not easy, but possible). Even if we win with a toxic Yas, it will not be fun at all.
4 A    Dedication. I'll support a gold player that has gotten very good with their champion over someone else in Masters that is first timing someone.
5 A    I've lost so many games due to bad team comp. Never again. Even if there is a champ I hate facing, having a good teamcomp will make sure it is still possible to stop them.
6 A   Just don't be a coward and you're good. Go anywhere with Amumu and his curse will kill you. Be anywhere near Eve and she will kill you just for fun.
7       Looks back at champion list from question 2, looks at choices...Oh dear.
8 B   No other choice. I've loved many of the champions released, and would much rather play every game flame free than get to have a crapshoot with a champion I designed personally. I'll still not be having as much fun with my own champ if I get glamed.

1. A Kallista is more fun to play with.
2. a day with {{champion:98}} pai would be great.
3. B a feeding botlane is recoverable a toxic yasuo would ruin my day.(probally take an hour or two till i log back on)
4. A rather someone who knows their champ then someone who is better all around.
5. B if vayne is deleted from the game i don't care if my team is full anything.
6. A Having him go shopping during black friday
7. A Piltover has more fun.
8. I'd love to create a champion.
Thanks for the fun ideas.

> 2. a day with {{champion:98}} pai would be great.

Dream on, buddy. He's mine.

This pretty much comes down to a bad bot lane VS a typical Yasuo.

Maybe. But playing with a challenger gives me bragging rights.
> 5. B if vayne is deleted from the game i don't care if my team is full anything.

I can toast to that.
> 6. A Having him go shopping during black friday

THAT TV IS MINE, WORMS!
> 7. A Piltover has more fun.

I'd love to have a pair of hover boots, so Piltover.
> 8. I'd love to create a champion.

Me too. But my ideas aren't good.
> Thanks for the fun ideas.

Why the hell am I replying to you?

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=d81mZvfn,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-12-23T01:11:09.073+0000)

Because it's fun.

1: Would you rather: A, granted the Azir knows what he's doing.


2: Would you rather: A, Darius.

3: Would you rather: A, every time I can just press mute.


4: Would you rather: A


5: A

6: B, he needs a friend

7: Undecided


8: A

B: Have a Azir on your team 

2: Would you rather:

but really i would spend the day with {{champion:136}} TO TEACH ME SOLPAI

B: Never will be flamed at again ( We have all been there, don't lie. )

1. {{champion:268}} because:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/eHgNXBP_Jwc/maxresdefault.jpg

2. A. It's nice to learn more about {{champion:42}} 's days with the Screaming Yipsnakes

3. B. I have zero tolerance for toxicity. At least one of us is going to carry the feeder.

4. B. At least this player is honest

5. A. What's the fun in not facing a champion you hate? Sometimes it's fun to have a challenge.

6. C. At least in the bedroom, that's where we play it.

7. A. Demacia is said to be declining due to being part of a changed world that it doesn't appear to be capable of adapting. It's still a strong military now but once everything else around it evolves completely, it's a matter of time before it falls behind in its military power. Piltover is pretty much the USA of Valoran. At least living there would feel somewhat familiar. Like Piltover, USA's glory days started when brilliant scientists and inventors were well commited to their ideas, creating advanced Technology that gave power to a progressive nation. Pretty soon Piltover will become the next region to have the most powerful military in the history of Valoran. They have machine guns, rockets, helicopters, all sorts of advanced weaponry. What does Demacia have? Swords? Shields? Axes? Magic Staffs? Those are nothing. Piltover's got the technology to harness magic and make a mere mortal become a one man killing machine. A battle between Piltover and Demacia or Piltover against any other nation would be the sorriest battle you'll ever see. You'll just have Piltover's airships rain death from above. Just ask {{champion:42}} 

8. A. I can handle flaming and I have ideas I'd like to put into the game. You guys should too.

1.B. 
2.A.-(if i picked annie i'd make do both) just kidding my pick would probably be akali
3.A.
4.A
5.A.
6.A.
7.B.
8.A. (flaming makes the game fun sometimes.)
1,3 & 4: Why not both?

1.) I would rather have an Azir because the only ones you see nowadays are the one trick mains who can still make him viable

2.) A. AND OMFG SO MANY CHOICES. 
*         Ryze, Be able to learn magic from him and help him keep the Runes safe (If he could be the only one who travels between worlds.)
*        Vi, because she would be one hell of a drinking buddy and would be the bestest of friends and loyal as hell.
*        Sona, imagine actually hearing her music in real life!
*        Ahri, because Women are weird so It would be interesting to see what would happen xD
*        Taliyah, because shes a very down to earth person and I love that. :)
*        And last but probably my favorite, Brand, because I woulda hella become the next incarnation of Brand.

3.) I would rather have a toxic yasuo because I could just mute them and deal with it.

4.) I think they are both the same, a Challenger player will have a decent understanding of how to play the champion without ever playing em. And One trick Sivir, well they know what they are doing to each movement click.

5.) Always have the perfect team comp, Because watching synergy happen is glorious

6.) Go hide and seek with evelynn, one because it would be hella challenging, and two, interesting to see the after.

7.) Probably Piltover, love the characters there, and im a techy nerd person.

8.) Create the next champion, or help in the story of it atleast :)

1: Would you rather:  
B: Have a Azir on your team: i want to see if  the bronze azirs can play like faker

2: Would you rather: 
> A: Spent a day with a champion you like  ( and what champion would that be? ):{{champion:432}}  i want to travel the world with his magical journey!

3: Would you rather: 
> A: Have a toxic Yasuo player on your team: its easy when you are one.
 

4: Would you rather:  
B: Support a Challenger first time Jinx: now i can brag about meeting a challenger

5: Would you rather:
> A: Always have a perfect team comp: i do not have a spefic feared champ, but a team comp can really get me going.
6: Would you rather: 
> A: Go shopping with Sion: sion kills everyone and we get free stuff XD
 

7: Would you rather

Last of all

8: Would you rather:

1. They can't. Unless you just mean the KDA.

1. Give me that {{champion:429}} . Can't remember the last Azir that did anything but die
2. I'd take a day with {{champion:55}} . I would learn so much murder stuff.
3. Tough one. I'd have to take the toxic yas because bot lane is so important in the current meta
4. I'll tough it out with the Jinx
5. I'll take having the perfect comp because theoretically, we would always have the tools to take out aforementioned hated champ
6. Is this even a question? Give me that shopping with Sion. Nobody would mess with you. Nobody.
7. I'd have to go with Piltover, just to try to find Jinx. I want to learn to be her kind of crazy.
8. I would really enjoy working on a new champion, so I would go with that option.

1. {{champion:268}} , obviously.
2. First blood cuz then i'll always be ahead.
3. Yasuo because I can mute him. Also bot lane is 80% how the game is determined.
4. Jinx b/c she's a better ADC.
5. Never get champ I hate. Sometimes weird comps work.
6. Hide and seek with Evelynn because she becomes visible when she's nearby :)
7. Piltover! I love their champs. Demacia a close second.
8. Create the next champion because then I can have something I'm always proud of.

1. {{champion:268}}
2. Spend a day with dat {{champion:22}}, of course.
3. Feeding bot lanes can be overcome.
4. Support a Challenjour.
5. Perfect team comp every time.
6. {{champion:32}} (I would advise against anything with {{champion:28}}.)
7. Probably Demacia, as long as I can visit Piltover on Fridays.
8. Create the next champ.

1. Azir. I am pretty good with Azir myself, and I know how good he is in the right hands.

1. Hang out with Azir, Lux or Soraka. You can't make me choose.

1. I have to say the Yasuo. Nobody said he wasn't good, and I can always mute him lol.

1. Probs Jinx. 

1. Perfect Team Comp! It will help me get past the champs I dislike.

1. Eh, Watch a movie with Amumu. At least he's not trying to kill me. XD

1. DEMACIAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!

1. I wanna make a champion pls!

1.  {{champion:429}}  cause idk she still has the ultimate kite in the game
2. Would really like a day with either {{champion:102}}  or {{champion:136}} 
3. I think I would take a bot lane feeding anyday. Yasuo is toxic enough with his kit and I don't want a main of him flipping out on me ever (and you know bot lane could recover)
4.  ooooooo.... as much as challenger is higher up, I say the diamond 1 m7 sivir is better simply because they may not be the best at the game as say a challenger, but they have way more experience and knowledge of the champ they're playing
5. hmmmmmmmmmmmmm-list of champions I never see again. goodbye {{champion:53}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:26}}  I will not miss any of you! (I hate a lot of champions in this game. and i guarantee the list will grow larger in time)
6. shop with Sion cause I can see so many funny scenarios from that already
7. I think piltover may be my best bet in living since its the closest thing to living in a real modern day city. I just don't think I could stand the people of Demacia constantly shouting their city name over and over and over how many times on a daily basis
8. I don't get too flamed that often, plus there's a reason for the mute button, so I'd go with creating a champion cause I want to see my project come to the game

1) Either, they are both fine in the right hands.  Kalista is meh, Azir is weaker until late game.

2) A, Taric

3) B, I can always go help and the game is more fun!

4) A, was just in a game with a challenger (I know right?) not overly impressed.  Would rather play with someone who loves their champion.

5) A, No champion I really hate.

6) B.  I would love to spend a day trying to cheer Amumu up.

7) A, Taric can't visit me in Demacia

8) B, I would be terrible at Balance and I don't need any champion other than Taric.  (Ok and Ahri, Thresh, Naut, and half the roster.)

1. b MAKE SHURIMA GREAT AGAIN
2. a {{champion:11}} We will meditate in a green aura thingy.
3. a. The mute button does wonders.
4. b. Because I don't support and we can fail together.
5. b. yuck fasuo
6. a. He can carry everything.
7. b. DEMACIAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
8. a. The mute button does wonders.

1. A (I play adc)
2. A, I'd like to meet my voidpuppy {{champion:96}} 
3. A (I play adc)
4. B, seems like a fun experience
5. B, as rare as perfect team comps are, ain't no one got time for {{champion:35}} 
6. A, rest is for the living (I'm a college student, I would know)
7. A, though if I were to rank places it would be 1)Bandle City 2)Piltover 3)Demacia
8. A, I can live with getting flamed at, but I have ideas flowing from my head just like it's a river.

Thank you for the post, I appreciate it.

1. Azir. We can make giant sand empires together and scream about Shurima.
2. Shenpai and I spending a day together? Sign me up, even if it's Apple's ToS. (Get your grubby hands away, Happy Honker!)
3. A feeding bot lane. Stupid salty Yasuos screaming like honorless cowards because the champion encourages it is annoying.
4. With a Challenger. I'll screenshot that game and show off my normals MMR.
5. If I don't ever have to deal with a fed Vayne again, that would be a blessed day.
6. Going to the cinema with Amumu would be boring. Playing hide and seek with Eve could end up deadly. Shopping with the Unstoppable Choo-choo train of death himself sounds fun.
7. Living in Demacia would mean living in a really cool Minas Tirith style city. But tech beats architecture, Piltover is my choice.
8. I honestly would create a new champion if it meant that I somehow made a really balanced, great champion by some miracle.

This was fun and hard, thanks!
